subject: Harness Racing
Hambletonian (Harness Race)
Horses
lead_paragraph: The dominant 3-year-old trotting colt won harness racing’s richest race by six lengths and finished in 1:50.20, a record for the event.
snippet: The dominant 3-year-old trotting colt won harness racing’s richest race by six lengths and finished in 1:50.20, a record for the event.
